General.text:
Type: Hyperglycemic,
antidote
Dosage Forms:
Common Trade Names: GlucaGen

Hypoglycemia.text:
1mg SC/IM/IV x 1
May repeat q20 min PRN

Beta-blocker_toxicity[1]_.text:
5mg IV bolus over one minute
Rebolus if no response after 10min
If effective, start infusion at 2-5mg/hr
